tit.e: Violence at Sumiya (a restaurant where high-class harlots and geisha dispatched from a geisha house entertained the guests)

tit.cmt: Edited for flow. "Violence at Sumiya" is a literal translation, and I would personally opt for "The Sumiya Incident"
NCのコメントに従って、変更しました。「角屋」の説明は次の「揚屋」に使用しました。

sen.j: 角屋での暴挙（すみやでのぼうきょ）とは文久3年（1863年）6月、京都嶋原の揚屋・角屋（すみや）にて催された宴会で、新選組局長芹沢鴨が働いた乱暴狼藉をいう。
sen.e: Violence at Sumiya was a violent behavior did by Kamo SERIZAWA, head of Shinsengumi, at a party held in ageya (a brothel) Sumiya in Shimabara, Kyoto in June, 1863.
Violence at Sumiya was an incident where by Kamo SERIZAWA, head of Shinsengumi carried out violent acts during a party held in ageya (a brothel) Sumiya in Shimabara, Kyoto in June, 1863.

The Sumiya Incident refers to violent acts which Kamo SERIZAWA, head of Shinsengumi (a group who guarded Kyoto during the end of Tokugawa Shogunate), carried out during a party held in ageya (a restaurant where high-class harlots and geisha dispatched from a geisha house entertained guests) called Sumiya in Shimabara, Kyoto in June, 1863.
sen.cmt: The Sumiya Incident に変更新撰組の説明補足「揚屋」に上記の説明を使用。全体的に書き換えました。

sen.j: 水口藩公用方が会津藩邸にて会津藩公用方に新選組の所業の悪さを訴えたことに始まる。
sen.e: The incident began when koyokata (the section of local domain which is in charge of dealing with all works related to the bakufu central government and the Imperial seat) of the Minakuchi domain complained about bad acts of Shinsengumi to koyokata of the Aizu domain.

The incident began when koyokata (a section of a local domain which was in charge of dealing with all works related to the central bakufu government and the Imperial seat) of the Minakuchi domain complained about the acts by the Shinsengumi to koyokata of the Aizu domain.

sen.j: それを聞きつけた芹沢が、永倉新八・原田左之助・井上源三郎・武田観柳斎の4人を差し向け、当事者の身柄引き渡しを水口藩に求めた。
sen.e: Serizawa who heard the news send four of Shinpachi NAGAKURA, Sanosuke HARADA, Genzaburo INOUE, and Kanryusai TAKEDA to the Minakuchi domain and asked a transfer of custody.

sen.j: 水口藩はこれに驚き、平身低頭謝罪し、詫び証文を書いて、その場を納めた。
sen.e: Minakuchi domain was surprised at that and humbly begged pardon, created a signed deed of apology to bring things under control.
Minakuchi domain was surprised at this and humbly begged for forgiveness, signing an apology to bring things under control.

sen.j: しかし、詫び証文を書いたことが水口藩主の耳に達せば、事と次第によれば公用方の断罪も逃れられなくなる。
sen.e: If the matter of having created the signed deed of apology was to be known to the lord of Minakuchi domain, koyokata was doomed to be convicted according to circumstances.

sen.j: そこで二条通りに直心影流道場を開いている戸田栄之助を通じ、証文の返却を依頼した。
sen.e: Then, the Minakuchi domain asked Shinsengumi to return the deed, through the intermediary of Einosuke TODA who had a swordsmanship training hall in Jikishinkage-ryu school in Nijo-dori Street.

sen.j: 翌日、角屋にて宴席が設けられた。
sen.e: On the next day, a party was held.
On the next day, a party was held.

sen.j: 席上、証文は問題なく返却されたが、宴もたけなわとなった席上で、酒がまわると酒乱となる芹沢が店の対応に腹を立て、遂に暴れ始めた。
sen.e: The deed was smoothly returned at the party, but, at the height of the party, SERIZAWA, a violent drunk, was angered at the service of the restaurant and went on a wild rampage at last.
The deed was returned without incident at the party, but, at its height, SERIZAWA, a violent drunk, was angered at the service of the restaurant and went on a wild rampage.

sen.j: 自慢の鉄扇を振り回し、席上に出ていた膳はもとより、店内の食器や什器を悉く叩き割り、挙げ句の果てには廊下の手摺りを外し酒樽に叩きつけて帳場を酒浸しにしてしまった。
sen.e: He brandished his vaunted iron-ribbed fan, broke and smashed all the tableware and fixtures as well as the small dining tables served at the party to pieces, and ended up by breaking off a handrail in the corridor and slamming it down on the sake cask to make the reception desk flooded with sake.

sen.j: そして最後に、店主の角屋徳右衛門に7日間の営業停止を申し渡し、意気揚々と引き上げたという。
sen.e: Finally, SERIZAWA issued a penalty of suspension of business for seven days to Tokuemon SUMIYA, the owner of the restaurant, and left there in high spirits.

sen.j: 同年9月18日 (旧暦)、会津藩の催した角屋での宴会で泥酔して屯所に帰宅した芹沢は、寝込みを近藤勇一派に襲われて絶命した。
sen.e: On September 18 in the same year (old calendar), when SERIZAWA got dead drunk at a party held by the Aizu domain in Sumiya and returned to the base, KONDO's faction surprise attacked SERIZAWA in his sleep and killed.

On September 18 of the same year (old calendar), when SERIZAWA became severely drunk during a party held by the Aizu domain in Sumiya and returned to base, KONDO's faction surprise attacked SERIZAWA in his sleep and killed him.

sen.e: Sumiya started in 164, and designated as the national important cultural property as the only one structural remnant of brothel.
